basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Eric Kinuthia. I am a junior software developer looking to begin my professional career in the tech industry. Before I decided to change careers, I was working as a delivery driver for Amazon. It was a very labor-intensive job with very long days. Working there helped me learn how to work as a team and develop a growth mindset which is critical to becoming a good software developer. I have always been passionate about computers because of their problem-solving capabilities. I chose to transition into software development at this point in my life to equip myself with the technical know-how and skills to be able to create software that makes people lives easier. And most importantly to be able to do what I love for work.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This project uses DOM manipulation and renders a table that displays hourly totals, and daily totals based on maximum customers, minimum customers and average cookies. When the user inputs new data, the table updates.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: This was my first project using React and my favorite project so far. It displays a gallery of horned animals and the user can choose to what beast to see based of that beasts number of horns.

projects.title: Tech-Folio
projects.description: The Tech-Folio website was a project we chose to design because creating professional portfolios can be a daunting task. The project is designed to take the ambiguity out of this problem.

experience.title: Delivery Driver
technologies: Delivered 300-400 packages to customers every day out of a local Amazon delivery station.

experience.title: Certified Nurse Assistant
technologies: Aided patients with basic care and tasks, providing personalized care to over 10 patients everyday.
